message: Hi Bob! I believe this product will be of great value to you. I'm offering it at a competitive price considering the market standards.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm prepared to offer $18000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but this product is highly valued at its quality and market demand. I can meet you halfway at $22000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $22000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm firm on $18000.  If you're not able to come down to that price, I'll have to seriously consider my other options.

Bob, I understand you have options, and I appreciate the dialogue. This product offers exceptional value, and Iâ€™m confident you'll see the benefits. How about we meet at $20000? I believe this is a fair deal for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $19000.  I think this is a fair compromise considering the value we've both discussed.
